text:
Hello, my name is Alex Dupont and i am sending you this letter to
explain to you my project for the next year. I am studying
information and comunication this year and it has create in me a new
dream that I would like to realize and this why I would need a
scolarship. So, my actual goal would be to travel the world and have
a journey in different countries I have never been in and study
people there, study their lifestyle, their culture and all the things
that can be different of how we live in Paris for example. To be
honnest, before college I have ever been atracted by traveling and I
wanted to stay in Paris for my hole life but now I really want to
discover other cultures because I want to have my own opinion on
every country and ecevry lifestyle. I want to studyand make research about it without need to seach a study made by another person. I think this would really help me inprove my english to, I would like to be able talking and communicating with a lot of people easly and even if I have an english class this would never be that usefull and learnfull than going directly there talking with natives speakers. I also think that travel is a really good way to be more open-minded and see the most different things as it is possible is, from my point of view, the best way to see what other culturs has to give to us. I think I have told you all the reasons I need your help to realize my project but you might ask why am I doing this now ? And I would easly respond to you that it is because of the benefits of college, this is the moment I have the possibility to do that and I am not stuck with a job so, for me it was a pretty logical choice and an opportunity I do not want to let go.
Thanks for reading me.
